summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Contentry content moderation platform. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend UI is working correctly with successful authentication flows, navigation, and core features.
passed_tests: Authentication: Email/phone login, signup (3-step process), OTP verification
Backend APIs: All 17 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Dashboard: Stats display correctly (total posts, approved, pending, flagged)
Content Moderation: Content input, analyze button, AI integration functional
Post Listing: Displays posts with proper status and platform icons
Navigation: Sidebar navigation between all pages working
Direct URL access: All pages accessible via direct URLs
User session management: Login/logout flows working correctly
